titles.title: America's Business Choice Act

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt passenger vehicles eligible for the alternative motor vehicle credit and the credit for qualified electric vehicles from the limitation on depreciation for luxury automobiles.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/1/2006--Introduced. America's Business Choice Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt certain electric motor vehicles and alternative fuel motor vehicles eligible for tax credits from depreciation limitations applicable to luxury automobiles.
